医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
为什么为幼儿寻找新冠疫苗仍然如此困难？ 9 月 12 日，疾病控制与预防中心建议 6 个月及以上的所有人进行下一轮新冠疫苗注射。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Why-is-finding-covid-shots-for-young-children-still-so-hard.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Why-is-finding-covid-shots-for-young-children-still-so-hard.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74f85203-33d6-4e18-b4d3-05c7ef6a8d7a Fri, 20 Oct 2023 14:30:00 -0400 Why is finding covid shots for young children still so hard?
让我们诚实地讨论一下随着年龄的增长会发生什么我们中有多少人想要一本可靠的、基于证据的衰老指南，来解释随着年龄的增长，我们的身体和思想如何变化，以及如何适应这些差异？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Lete28099s-have-an-honest-conversation-about-what-to-expect-as-you-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Lete28099s-have-an-honest-conversation-about-what-to-expect-as-you-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0671f33-cb01-42a6-ad09-449c9e72ce87 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 11:48:37 -0400 Let’s have an honest conversation about what to expect as you age
新大米的发现可能是糖尿病患者和大米爱好者的好消息对于那些吃不够米饭但担心糖和碳水化合物摄入量的人来说是个好消息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-rice-discovery-could-be-good-news-diabetics-and-rice-lovers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-rice-discovery-could-be-good-news-diabetics-and-rice-lovers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5972cc11-ec2d-4f9a-87a5-a96d61c49d00 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 10:53:00 -0400 New rice discovery could be good news diabetics and rice lovers
科学家和利益相关者强调需要对 PFAS 和其他 EDC 进行更严格的监管在欧盟化学品立法的这个关键时刻，独立科学的声音在第五届内分泌干扰物年度论坛上占据了中心舞台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Scientists-and-stakeholders-highlight-the-need-for-stricter-regulation-of-PFAS-and-other-EDCs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Scientists-and-stakeholders-highlight-the-need-for-stricter-regulation-of-PFAS-and-other-EDCs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef9f50c0-193d-4cde-9c3e-91aa2cccb6f8 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 10:47:00 -0400 Scientists and stakeholders highlight the need for stricter regulation of PFAS and other EDCs
新的人工智能算法可以高精度预测在线学生的表现科尔多瓦大学的一个团队设计了一个基于模糊逻辑的模型，可以预测在线教育学生的表现，将他们分为 4 类，帮助教授根据每个学生的具体情况，为他们提供更个性化的帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-AI-algorithm-predicts-online-student-performance-with-high-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/New-AI-algorithm-predicts-online-student-performance-with-high-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26051f64-45e7-4cd9-b15a-d30bdd01e84e Fri, 20 Oct 2023 10:40:00 -0400 New AI algorithm predicts online student performance with high accuracy
IOF 调查显示体检期间忽视了骨骼健康国际骨质疏松症基金会 (IOF) 对来自五个国家的 7000 多名 60 岁及以上女性完成的一项调查显示，该年龄段的女性中近二分之一受到骨折的影响，而矛盾的是，骨骼健康在医疗检查过程中却被忽视了。 UPS。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Bone-health-neglected-during-medical-check-ups-IOF-survey-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Bone-health-neglected-during-medical-check-ups-IOF-survey-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d2c14da-519f-4234-a36b-bd47e0b66fa8 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 10:25:00 -0400 Bone health neglected during medical check-ups, IOF survey reveals
阿托伐醌治疗疟疾的“化学疫苗”可能比想象的更可行约翰·霍普金斯大学的研究人员希望利用阿托伐醌开发一种长效、可注射的疟疾预防剂，他们在一项新研究中表明，耐药性可能并不是科学家认为的挑战，特别是在使用阿托伐醌作为疟疾预防剂时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Atovaquone-chemical-vaccine-for-malaria-could-be-more-feasible-than-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Atovaquone-chemical-vaccine-for-malaria-could-be-more-feasible-than-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcaae82e-7433-46ca-aabd-e12d0383410d Fri, 20 Oct 2023 10:18:00 -0400 Atovaquone "chemical vaccine" for malaria could be more feasible than thought
不良的童年经历会对心理和情绪健康产生长期影响不良童年经历（ACE）被定义为一系列压力或创伤性事件，包括虐待、忽视或家庭功能障碍（患有精神疾病或入狱的亲戚、目睹家庭暴力等）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Adverse-childhood-experiences-have-long-term-impact-on-mental-and-emotional-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Adverse-childhood-experiences-have-long-term-impact-on-mental-and-emotional-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e56810b4-8e54-4c89-86e6-95b908d98cea Fri, 20 Oct 2023 10:11:00 -0400 Adverse childhood experiences have long-term impact on mental and emotional health
儿童心理健康危机在大流行期间急剧上升并持续存在威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约长老会研究人员的一项研究表明，在大流行期间，需要急诊室护理的儿童和青少年的心理健康危机急剧增加，并且尽管恢复正常，但仍然居高不下。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pediatric-mental-health-crisis-skyrocketed-and-persisted-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pediatric-mental-health-crisis-skyrocketed-and-persisted-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f90ce1a-a6c4-4dc5-b1e7-2eca4a473385 Fri, 20 Oct 2023 09:58:00 -0400 Pediatric mental health crisis skyrocketed and persisted during the pandemic
瞳孔大小可以预测 TMS 治疗抑郁症的反应加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心研究人员的新发现表明，测量瞳孔对光反应的变化可以帮助预测抑郁症的恢复情况，并个性化经颅磁刺激 (TMS) 治疗重度抑郁症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pupil-size-may-predict-response-to-TMS-treatment-for-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231020/Pupil-size-may-predict-response-to-TMS-treatment-for-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f76b0853-e871-41e5-a621-3c23f597384b Fri, 20 Oct 2023 09:53:00 -0400 Pupil size may predict response to TMS treatment for depression
